item.title: Hi! I'm Enrique
item.description:
I am a telecom engineer working as a software engineer at Skyscanner. This blog is just a quick reference for mainly technical stuff I find interesting. If you wanna get in touch, hit me up on @equirn

You can find more about me listening to this podcast: Episode 4 â€“ A graduates journey

I am also part of the Skyscanner Barcelona Ambassador group in charge of organizing events at the @CodeVoyagers office for the software developer community in Barcelona like the Python meetup or the Docker meetup among others. Feel free to get in touch if you are looking for a space to host your SW-related meetup in Barcelona
